=== Introduction ===

Inclusion of CACert.org certificate into Ubuntu, both as part of ca-certificate package and included in any applications that do not depend on this; in particular, the default web browser (Firefox), and the default email client (Thunderbird).

CACert is a non-profit community certificate authority.
